sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"替代，取代"之意。
means: replace ： 最普通用词，指任何形式的替代，尤指以新的替代旧的、老的和坏的等，指人指物均可。
substitute ： 指某人因故不在时，由别人代理其职，有时也可指由一物去代替另一物。
displace ： 侧重指用另外的人或物强行取代并非称职的人或无用之物，指人时往往暗含带不满情绪的意味。

sentence.Network_en: Who do you suppose will replace her on the show?
sentence.Network_cn: 你觉得谁会代替她参加这场演出？

sentence.Network_en: Around 1910 motorized carriages were beginning to replace horse-drawn cabs.
sentence.Network_cn: 大约从1910年起，机动车开始取代马车。

sentence.Network_en: Steel cable will be used to replace worn ropes.
sentence.Network_cn: 将用钢缆替换磨损的绳索。

会计&财务术语的中英对照_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... replacement servicers 替代的服务者 replacements 替换件 report 报告.
# 替换成(replaced)@ 好的域名能提升 : 公司品牌企业形象好的域名能降低 : 宣传费用客户流失精明的您更能意识到一个好域名的.
Metal halide lamps can be replaced with high pressure lamp or lamps without ozone ., 而金属卤素灯却可以换成矮压水银灯或无臭氧灯.

entry.def: If one thing or person replaces another, the first is used or acts instead of the second.

example.ex: The council tax replaces the poll tax next April.
example.tran: 市政税在明年4月将取代人头税。

example.ex: ...the city lawyer who replaced Bob as chairman of the company...
example.tran: 取代鲍勃成为公司主席的市政律师

entry.def: If you replace one thing or person with another, you put something or someone else in their place to do their job.

example.ex: I clean out all the grease and replace it with oil so it works better in very low temperatures...
example.tran: 我把所有的油脂清除干净，然后用油来代替，从而使它在低温条件下运转得更好。

example.ex: The BBC decided it could not replace her.
example.tran: 英国广播公司认定那不能取代她。

entry.def: If you replace something that is broken, damaged, or lost, you get a new one to use instead.

example.ex: The shower that we put in a few years back has broken and we cannot afford to replace it.
example.tran: 我们几年前安装的淋浴器坏了，但买不起新的来换。

entry.def: If you replace something, you put it back where it was before.

example.ex: The line went dead. Whitlock replaced the receiver...
example.tran: 线路中断了，惠特洛克把听筒放回原处。

example.ex: Replace the caps on the bottles.

means.word_mean: 1. substitute a person or thing for (another that is broken or inefficient or lost or no longer working or yielding what is expected);

sentences.sentence: "We need to replace the secretary that left a month ago"
"the insurance will replace the lost income"
"This antique vase can never be replaced"

means.word_mean: 2. take the place or move into the position of;

sentences.sentence: "Smith replaced Miller as CEO after Miller left"
"the computer has supplanted the slide rule"
"Mary replaced Susan as the team's captain and the highest-ranked player in the school"

means.word_mean: 3. put in the place of another; switch seemingly equivalent items;

sentences.sentence: "the con artist replaced the original with a fake Rembrandt"

means.word_mean: 4. put something back where it belongs;

sentences.sentence: "replace the book on the shelf after you have finished reading it"
"please put the clean dishes back in the cabinet when you have washed them"

auth_sentence.res_content: In another version, doctors replace only the ball.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 移置, 转移, 取代, 置换
stems_affixes.word_buile: displace取代,替换+ment表名词→n.移置, 转移, 取代, 置换
fire火+place放,地方→生火的地方→壁炉

stems_affixes.value_cn: 地方, 地点, 位置
stems_affixes.word_buile: place放,地方→n.地方, 地点, 位置 v.放置

stems_affixes.value_cn: 取代,替换,替换物,代替物
stems_affixes.word_buile: replace代替+ment表名词→n.取代,替换,替换物,代替物
dis去掉+place放,地方→把放的东西去掉
place放,地方→n.地方, 地点, 位置 v.放置

stems_affixes.value_cn: 取代,替换,代替,把……放回原处
stems_affixes.word_buile: re重新+place放,地方→重新放→复职,引申为"代替"

Sentence.sentence: Equally, TV was supposed to replace movies but, again, did not.
Mounted cavalry (骑兵) replaced the chariot (二轮战车) on the battlefield around 1000 BC.
Paperbacks of popular literature are more likely to be replaced by e-books

Confronted with such facts,some Swedish activists and legislators are demanding more extreme and far-reaching measures, such as replacing male and female pronouns with a neutral alternative and monitoring children more closely to correct them when they gravitate(被吸引) toward gendered play.
iPhones and iPods will replace laptops sooner or later
I'm not someone who's anti-technology, but I'm always worried that technology becomes an end in and of itself, and it replaces teaching or it replaces analysis.

sentences.en: He picked them up and replaced them in the bag.
sentences.cn: 他把它们捡了起来, 放回包里。

jushi.english: Nowadays, computer has replaced man in many fields.
jushi.chinese: 如今,计算机在许多领域取代了人。

jushi.english: Jack has replaced Tom as monitor of our class.
jushi.chinese: 杰克接替汤姆当了我们的班长。

jushi.english: I replaced him as your superior.
jushi.chinese: 我代替他作你们的上司。
